analysis_racial: The job posting maintains a neutral tone regarding racial bias, using language that is unbiased and inclusive. Phrases such as "equal opportunities employer" and "welcomes applications from all candidates" convey a commitment to diversity and inclusion, without favoring any specific racial group.
text:
Ibarra Ltd is seeking a highly motivated and talented IT Engineer - Intern to join our team. As a leader in the tech industry, we strive to create a culture of openness and inclusivity, where everyone has equal opportunities to grow and succeed.

Job Type: Internship
Job Description:
We are looking for an IT Engineer - Intern who will assist our team in maintaining and improving our systems, networks, and infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in computer systems, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work well in a team environment.

Responsibilities:

- Assist in the design, development, and implementation of new systems and infrastructure
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely and efficient manner
- Collaborate with team members to identify and prioritize project tasks and deliverables
- Participate in knowledge-sharing sessions to improve technical skills and expertise

Qualifications:

- Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
- Strong understanding of computer systems, networks, and infrastructure
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work well in a team environment and communicate effectively

Benefits:

- Competitive internship salary
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible working hours and remote work options

Ibarra Ltd is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all candidates.

{"position": "IT Engineer - Intern", "inference_time": 12.9538371563, "prompt_tokens": 577, "completion_tokens": 345, "total_tokens": 922, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Ibarra Ltd\nRole: IT Engineer - Intern\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Neutral, language is unbiased and does not favour any racial group. Examples are:\n    - A child born to an undocumented immigrant is eligible for support..\n    - Striving to be a leader in diversity and inclusion..\n    - Supporting a culture of openness and inclusivity..\n    - Encouraging applications from American Indians..\n    - Equal opportunities for all candidates are provided.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "<j>

Ibarra Ltd is seeking a highly motivated and talented IT Engineer - Intern to join our team. As a leader in the tech industry, we strive to create a culture of openness and inclusivity, where everyone has equal opportunities to grow and succeed.

Job Type: Internship
Job Description:
We are looking for an IT Engineer - Intern who will assist our team in maintaining and improving our systems, networks, and infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in computer systems, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work well in a team environment.

Responsibilities:

- Assist in the design, development, and implementation of new systems and infrastructure
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely and efficient manner
- Collaborate with team members to identify and prioritize project tasks and deliverables
- Participate in knowledge-sharing sessions to improve technical skills and expertise

Qualifications:

- Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
- Strong understanding of computer systems, networks, and infrastructure
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work well in a team environment and communicate effectively

Benefits:

- Competitive internship salary
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible working hours and remote work options

Ibarra Ltd is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all candidates.

</j>

<racial>
The job posting maintains a neutral tone regarding racial bias, using language that is unbiased and inclusive. Phrases such as "equal opportunities employer" and "welcomes applications from all candidates" convey a commitment to diversity and inclusion, without favoring any specific racial group.
